remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派給收件者傳送訊息之前，請修改網際網路電子郵件訊息的內容。The delegate modifies the contents of an Internet email message before the message is sent to the recipients. 例如，您可以加入其他收件者或自訂訊息頁尾識別您的網站使用此處理常式的所有訊息。For example, you can add additional recipients or a custom message footer identifying your Web site to all messages using this handler. `e`參數是包含電子郵件訊息中指定的執行個體屬性。The `e` parameter is a instance that contains the email message specified in the property. 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立修改之前將它傳送至收件者的電子郵件訊息的執行個體。The following code example creates a instance to modify an email message before sending it to the recipient.
